A puru ibute nje site ní isoro onye buya nwee mmekoahu níenweghi ihe ngbochi, jiri otu aguma kpua agiri isi ma obu site ní igbanwetari akuku ahu. A pughi ibute oria a site ní ikwe na aka, mmaku, iyi otu efe, iriko nri na inu mmiri dgz.Uzo kasi mma isi gbochie ibute nje oria a bu:- Ejila otu aguma eme ihe, Zere mmekoahu, soro nani onye otu olulu gi nwee nmkoahu ma oburu na ichoro inwe jiri ogbunnabuenyi mee ihe mgbe ina-enwe nmekoahu. Mee nnocha iji choputa ma I nwere nje oria HIV.

general_health.name: Gini bu kansa ma o bu acha-ere?
general_health.content:
Kansa bu mgbe kpuru ndu no níime ahu malitere ito ma gabiga oke. Nkpuru ndu ndi ahu na-amalite iga na akuku ahu ndi ozo. Ihe ana-akpo udi oria bu kansa. O puru imetuta akuku ahu o bula. A puru ihu ya níakpa ikuku, ara, akpukpo aru, afo na amu.
Ihe ndi puru ikpata kansa bu, ihe nche mmri ulo, anuru utaba, anuru oku site osisi na unyi, nje si níumu ahuhu, mmanu ma o bu ude níekpocha ahu, mmiri ogwu utodu na ika nka.

general_health.name: Gini onyunyu na igboo agboo?
general_health.content: Nke a bu udi oria otoro nke ana-ebute site níinu mmiri na nri nje banyere. Ihe eji amata oria a bu inyu nsi mmiri mmiri. Afo osisa ya níebido malite níawa iri ní abuo rue ubochi ise, mgbe onye ahu risiri nri na mmiri nje oria a banyere níime ya. Oria otoro ma o bu afo osisa níegbu mmadu ngwa ma o buru níagwoghi ya ngwa ngwa iji gbochie oria afo osisa, biko kpuchie nri na mmiri ka ijiji ghara ibesa ha, kwochapu aka ngwa ngwa ijesiri npochi ma o bu metu nsi aka kwochapu aka gi tupu i rie nri na mgbe I risiri nri, debe ebe obibi gi ocha mgbe niile.

general_health.name: Gini bu Ebola?
general_health.content:
Ebola bu oria ogbara ohuru nke nje virus na-akpata. Onye butere oria na-egosi ihe ama malite níubuchi nke abuo(2) rue ubochi nke iri abuo na otu mgbe o butesiri oria ebola.
Ihe mgba-ama izizi ya bu ahuoku, ike ogwugwu, akwara igbu ngbu, isi owuwa, akpiri ntachi. Ihe ama níesochi bu igboo agboo, afo osisa, oko, umeji na akuru nsogbu, obara igba níime ahu níelu ahu, eze igba obara, nsi na obara igwakota. Mmadu puru ibute oria Ebola site níimetu obara, akuku ahu na mmiri si níahu anumanu bu oria a aka dika enwe, ozo dingba, ele, adaka, usuu nta na ozu umu anumanu ndi nwuru onwe ha níime ohia. Mmadu puru ibute oria ebola site ibitu aka ozu onye ebola gburu.

sex.name: Gini na- akpata oko igha nwoke n’amu ma o bu nwanyi n’ike
sex.content: Ihe na akpatakari oko igha nwoke n’amu ma o bu nwanyi n’ike bu nje. Oko igha nmmadu n’ike ma  obu n’amu mgbe ufodu n’esite n’mmiri  ma o bu iju oyi n’akuku ahu ndia, ozo, iyi akwa n’atapagide n’ahu ogologo oge sokwa akpata oko. Oko n’ahu onwe onye puru isite n’ihe si n’ogwu puta na oria ndi ebutere n’mmekoabu.

sex.name: Gini bu Sifilis (Syphilis?)
sex.content:
Sifilis bu oria ana-ebute site n’mmekoahu. Ihe ama bu onya n’anaghi egbu ngbu n’aputa n’amu, ike, otule na onu. Ana ebufe sifilis site n’otu onye ozo gafere onye ozo mgbe emeturu onya ahu.
Enwere sifilis di  iche iche. Ma n’ozuzu, sifilis na-anogide n’ahu obunadi mgbe onya ahu lara. A puru igwo sifilis oso-oso ma o buru na agwopughi ya oso-oso, o puru  ikpata oria uburu, obi na akuku ahu ndi ozo di nkpa.

sex.name: Oria ndi ana-ebute site n’mmekoahu
sex.content:
Oria mmekoahu bu oria ndi a na-ebute site n’inwe nmekoahu n’ekwesighi ekwesi. Ihe na akpatakari oria a  bu nje. E nwere ihe kariri oria  iri abua di iche iche (20) ana-ebute site n’mmekoahu, ha gunyere:
Chlamydia
Ukwu Uwa
Ota gari 
O biri na aja ocha (HIV)
Iba ocha n’anya 
Sifilis (Syphilis)
Trichomoniasis
Oria ndia edeputara  n’elu n’emetuta ma nwoke  ma nwamji, ma umu nwanyi no, n’ihe ize ndu kari. O buru na nwanyi di ime ebute udi oria (STD’S) nke viros kpatara, oga emetuta ahuike nke nwa ebu n’ afo. 
Ogwu ogbu nnu oria puru inyeaka gwoo oria (STDS) nke nje , aruru, ma obu mmiri ojo kpatara. Ma enwebeghi ogwugwu doro anya maka(STDS)nke viros kpatara, ee ogwu ufodu nwere ike ibelata nmuba nke oria ndia.

sex.name: Inwe mmekoahu mgbe adi ime, opuru inye nwa ebu na afo nsogbu?
sex.content: Mbanu, mmekoahu apughi ime ya. Inwe agu mmekoahu ma obu inu uto mmekoahu apughi ikpata ime omume n’ike ma obu ime opupu, otu odi, uto mmekoahu puru ime ka nwa ebu n’ato megharia ahu obere oge. Nkea anaghi enye nsogbu.

sex.name: Inwe mmekoahu, o puru ikpata ime erughi eru?
sex.content: Mbanu, mmekoahu apughi ime ya. Inwe agu mmekoahu ma obu inu uto mmekoahu apughi ikpata ime omume n’ike ma obu ime opupu, otu odi, uto mmekoahu puru ime ka nwa ebu n’ato megharia ahu obere oge. Nkea anaghi enye nsogbu.

sex.name: Nmekoahu o puru idi iche mgbe m di ime?
sex.content: Ee, mmekoahu puru inwe mmetuta di iche mgbe nwanyi di ime. N’ihi na mmasi o nwere n’ebe mmekoahu no puru iri elu ma o bu daa, mmekoahu puru itokwo ya uto. Nke a bu n’ihi n’obara na-aga ziriri werere n’ebe akuku ahu eji enwe mmekoahu no, ha pukwara iza. Mgbe ufodu, nwanyi agaghi enwecha mmasi inwe mmekoahu mgbe o di ime, n’ihi mgbanwe ufodu n’ewere onodu n’ahu ya. Mgbe nwanyi di ime, ara ya na adi pekepeke ma maa mma ibitu aka. Nkea puru ime ka o nwekwue mmasi inwe mmekoahu, ma o bukwanu, o gaghi amasicha ya.

sex.name: Onodu nwanyi puru ino nwe mmekuahu mgbe odi ime.
sex.content: Nwanye puru ino onodu di-iche iche nwe mmekoahu mgbe odi ime. Ya na di puru idina akuku na akuku, o puru ino di ya n’elu ma obu di ya anoro ya n’elu.  Di ya pukwara isi n’azu. Nwanyi kwesiri igwa di ya onodu na-ato ya uto n’nke n’egbu ya ngbu.

sex.name: Nwanyi emwechaghi mmasi inwe mmeckoahu mgbe  o di ime, okwesiri ekwesi?
sex.content: Enwechaghi mmasi inwe mmekoahu bu ihe na-emekari mgbe nwanyi ditara ime ohuru. Otu odi, enwela nkuda mmuo n’ihi nke a. I ga- ebidokwa nwewa mmasi mwe mmekoahu mghe agba nke  abuo nke afo ime gi bidoro, Biko, echegbula onwe gi maka ahu gi na nwa ibu n’ afo. Biko, guo akara nke isii(6) nke edemede a.

sex.name: Nwanyi, o kwesiri iji onu nwe mmekoahu mgbe o di ime?
sex.content: Iji onu enwe mmeKoahu mgbe nwanyi di ime adichaghi mma n’ihi ihe ufodu. Ekwela ka di gi jiri onu ya michaa otu’ gi.  o puru ifunye ikiki n’obara gi. Otu o di, nke a anaghi emekebe o puru ikpatara gi a nwa ibu `n’afo odachi. Ijiri onu gi michaa utu di gi ga-ebutere gi odachi. Ma o buru na di gin were oria ana-ebute site n’mmekoahu (STI) dika oria nkpuru aku (Herpes). O bunu na nwanyi nwere oriaa (STI) di ya ekwesighikwa iji onu dinaa ya. Dina nwunye mwere oria obiri na aja ocha (HIV) ekwesighi inwa anwa jiri onu ha mwee mmekaohu. Nchoputa na-egosi na ana-ebute oria o biri na aja ocha site na obere asu ma o bu obara. Juo dokita gi ma inwe ajuju ozo.

sex.name: Olee otu m puru isi gbochie oria ana ebute site n’mmekoahu (STI)
sex.content:
I na etinye onwe gi na di gi n’ihe ize ndu di ukwu ma o buru n’ina akwa iko aghara aghara, ya bu isoro onye n’abughi onye otu olulu gi n’ enwe mmekoahu mgbe nile. Biko chebe onwe gi na di gi site n’ime nke mbu.
(1) Soro onye otu olulu gi nani n’enwe mmekuahu mgbe niile.
(2)  Were okpunnabuenyi mgbe o bula lchoro inwe mmekoahu. Tinye ya nke oma tupu ibido.

sex.name: Ole onodu kasi mma mwanyi puru ino nwe mmekoahu mgbe o di ime?
sex.content: Anyi atulewo okwu a n’akara nke asaa (7) nke edemede a. Onodu kasi mma bu onodu na-eme ka ahu rue gi ala ma kwe ka mmekoahu too gi uto gughachi akara nke (7) asaa nke ema.

sex.name: Olee ihe ndi ga-eme mgbe nwanyi di ime na-enwe nmekoahu nke ga-akpali ya ikpoturu dokita ma o bu noosu.
sex.content: Mgbe o bula I huru ihe ndi n’ekwesighi ekwesi mgbe gi na di gi n’enwe mmekoahu, biko kputuru dokita. O bu ihe ana-ahukebe inwe obere ihe ufu mgbe ana-enwe nmekoahu ma o bu ngwa ngwa enwechara. O buru na ihe ufu ahu akwusighi mgbe nkeji ole n’ ole gasiri, ma o bu ina-enwe ihe ngbu na obara ogbugba mgbe inwechara mmekoahu, biko kpoturu dokita.

sibiling.name: Oria akpukpo ahu umuaka: Ihe mgba ama na ihe na akpata ya.
sibiling.content:
Ihe na- akpatakari oria akpukpo ahu amuaka bu nje, ogwu ahu mmadu n’achoghi, okpomoku na ibanti dere mmiri. Oria akpukpo ahu umuaka na alakari ososo. Ha gunyere:
a.  Oko hiti: aha ozo ana-akpo oko hiti bu oko beriberi. Ihe na akpata ya bu ososo n’ ataghi ata ma nogide n’ elu ahu. O na adikari ntakiri, dika obere etito ma n’ acha mmanu mmanu. O na aputakari n’ ike ma o bu otule na azu nwata. A na ahukari ya n’ obodo ndi nwere oke okpomoku oke okochi. Ihe na-akpatakwa oko hiti bu oke afuru ma obu ososo ana-enwe n’ oge oke okpomoku, oke iba, inyibe nwata akwa di ikputu ma o bu di oku. Inyibe nwata akwa n’anaghi enye ikuku ohere na ite oke ude ndi na akpochi ohere ososo si apu n’ ahu nwata.
b.  Oko ibanti. Udi oko a na aghakari umuaka di onwa itoolu rue out ato ( 9-12 months) o na aputakari n’ ukwu ebe ahu ana-enyinye ha ibanti. Mmamiri na nsi ino ogologo oge n’ ahu nwata n’ ebute nje na oria nye nwata.
c.  Mgbawa Isi- nke a bu apa ndi na-aputa n’ si nwata. O na putakari n’ olu na akpa abu nwata. Nje na mmanu ndi n’ esi n’ ahu na agiri isi nwata puta n’ akpata ya.
d.  Ogwo- ha bu akpakiri na – adighi mma ile anya nke na-aputa n’ ahu nwata. Ana ahukari ya n’ nti na ukwu nke amuaka na umu amuru ohuru, mgbe ufodu ndi okenye n’ enwekwa ya, ihe na akpatakari ogowo edochaghi anya, ma ihe ndia sonu n’ atunye utu-oke okpomoku, nje virus, ulo uzuzu di, ncha na- ekpocha ahu na ude.

sibiling.name: Igbochi na igwo oria akpukpo ahu amuaka
sibiling.content:
Nyibe umuaka gi akwa di fecha fecha n’ adabere otu ihu elu igwe di. Ejila ncha ndi na-ekwocha ahu asa umuaka ahu. Ozo ejila dye asa akwa amuaka gi. Jiri nkeji ise rue iri ( 5-10mms) saa nwata ahu were ude di juu dika ori tee ha.
a.  Igwo oko hiti-zere ibanti di ikputu. Zere ude ndi n’ ekpo oku, jiri mmiri oyi saa nwata ahu. Zuru ude ndi eji agwo oko hiti. 
b.  Igwo oko ibanti- gbanwe ibanti obula ruru unyi,were mmiri saa otule nwata  ngwa ngwa iwepuru ibanti, ma were ude vasilini tee n’ otule nwata ozugbo. Zuru ude ndi okachamara deputara maka iji, gwoo oko iba nti di oke njo.
c.  Igwo Mgbawa isi umuaka- Tinye mmanu owu n’ isi nwata, odikaria ala out awa tupu I saa nwata ahu. Werekwa shampoo emeputara iji saa isi nwata. Kpoturu ndi dokita ma o karia gi.
d.  Igwo ogwo- jiri ncha na mmiri di nari nari saa nwata ahu. Mee ka ahu nwata koo nke oma tupu I tee ya ude. Zuru ude ndi emeputara maka igwo ogwo. Tee ya nwata dika esi tuzie aka.

sibiling.name: Ihe ndi na akpata iba na ahu oku umuaka.
sibiling.content:
Ihe otutu ikpo oku na iju oyi nke nwata ana-akpo temperecho bu degree 36.5oc -38oc. Ahu oku n’ebido mgbe otutu ikpo oku na iju oyi nke ahu nwata gafere digri 38oc.
Ahu oku bu ihe n’ egosi n’ oria abiala obughi oria n’ onwe ya. O bu otu uzo ahu mmadu si ebu agha megide oria.
Otutu ihe puru ikpatara nwata ahu oku, nke puru ino nani ubochi ole n’ ole. Ma, mge ufodu ahu oku nwata puru inotu odu, ma burukwa ihe ama nke oria di njo. Nje bu ihe na-akpatakari ahu oku umuaka.

sibiling.name: Ihe ama nke ahu oku.
sibiling.content: Kwa ubochi, ihe otutu nke iju oyi na ikpo oku nke ahu nwata n’ ari elu ma n’ arida. Ona-adikari ala n’ isi ututu ma na-agbago na mgbe. Ahu oku puru iji nwayo nmayo bia nwata ma o bukwanu bia oku-oku.

sibiling.name: Ihe ndi na-akpatakari ahu oku:-
sibiling.content:
a)  Viros:- Viros na-ebute oria ndi dika oyi, iku ume elu elu na akpata.
b)  Bakiteria:- Bakiteria na-ebute oria nti, akpiri, anya odo, oria mmamiri, oyi, akpiri ngbapia, na nje ibarye n’ obara
c)  Ogwu ahu mmadu n’ achoghi- Ahu oku puru ibia n’ ihi ogwu ahu nwata juru, ogwu ngbochi oria, ndudu ma o bu ikuku n’ adighi ocha.

sibiling.name: Mgbe Ikwesiri ihu onye dokita maka ahu oku nwata.
sibiling.content:
a)  Mgbe nwata n’ erubeghi onwa ato nwere ahu oku. Mee ngwa hu dokita n’ihi na osiri ike imata ma o bu oria di oke njo n’ akpata ya bu ahu oku.
b) Mgbe nwata no onwa ato rue otu afo (3 – 12) nwere ahu oku. Gaa hu dokita, eleghi anya o puru ibu oria di oke njo n’akpata ahu oku. Gaa hu dokita, eleghi anya o puru iu oria di oke n’akpata ahuoku ahu.
c)  Gaa hu dokita mghe nwata di otu afo ma n’ egosiputa the ama ndia:
d) Ekughi ume nke oma
e)  Iro ura
f)  Igboo agbo na onyunyu onyunyu
g) Isi Owuwa, olu  ngbu na oku igbu ya ngbu n’ anya
h) Dika onye oria, onye ike gwuru ma n’ ata ahu.
i)  Juu inu mmiri, ma kwusi inyu mmamiri otu okwesiri
j) N’enwe ahu ngbu
k)  Enweghi ike Igbake mgbe ubochi abuo gasiri
l)  Ma oburu na ichere n’enwere ihe ndi ozo gahierenu.

sibiling.name: Otu esi agwo oku
sibiling.content:
Odi oke nkpa inye nwata mimiri na, ihe onunu ndi kwesiri ekwesi iji zere mmiri iko n’ ahu nwata, o buru na nwata ahu anaghi ekwe anu mmiri, biko gwa dokita gi.
Mee ihe  ndia iji nyere nwata ahu aka :
a.  Nyibe nwata ahu akwa di fere fere
b.  Zere idee nwata n’ okpuru fan 
c.  Nye nwata mmiri ara nke oma 
d.  Nye nwata nri obere obere ma o buru na ona eri nri Umuaka.
e.  Nogide n’ enye nwata ahu mimiri ara ma o burukwa n’ okariala onwa isii (6 months) ma o burukwanu nri ozo na mmiri.
f.  Nye nwata ahu pracetamol dika onye dokita si tuzie aka. Enyela karia otu okwesiri, maka nka puru ibibi umeji nwata ahu.

spouse.name: Gini  na – akpata agbapughi Obara Ocha ?
spouse.content: Ihe na – akpatakari agbapughi Obara bu mgbe Obara ocha nwoke banyere na – akpakuru kama ibaye n’ onu utu nke nwoke. Ihe na akpatakari nke a bu Oria mmamiri, okpukpu azu inwe nkwaru, iwa ahu n’ amu ma obu n’ akpa mmamiri.

spouse.name: Nsogbu Ahu nwoke akwughi oto?
spouse.content:
Ahu nwoke ma o bu amu nwere nsogbu mgbe o na-emweghi ike ikwu oto ogologo oge. A na-akpo onye nwere udi nsogbu a “Okiri
apiri amu”. Nsogbu na-ebidokari mgbe mmadu no na okorobia ma obu
oge agadi, ma o na-abukari oria umu nwoke mere agadi; umu mwoke nwere nsogbu ahuike, mgbe ufodu umu nwoke n’enwetu nsogbu ahuike ma obu amu akwughi oto nke oma, nke adichaghi njo.

spouse.name: Olee Ihe ndi na-akpa nsogbu amu akwughi oto?
spouse.content:
E nwere otutu ihe na-akpata amu akwughi oto nke oma. Ha gunyere ndi a:-
a. Inu oke mmanya n’ aba n’ anya na ise siga
b. Nsogbu ahuike dika oria mmamiri, obara ngbali elu, nchegbu na ida mba n’ obi.
c.  Ndoli ma obu doga-doga.
d.  Ihe si n’ inu ogwu puta
e.  Nkwaru ma obu obara abanyeghi nke oma n’ utu
f.  Iwa ahu n’ ihi ibi odida.

spouse.name: Gini bu ihe mgba ama?
spouse.content: Nani ihe ama enwere bu mgbe amu nwoke n’ enweghi ike ikwu oto ogologo oge, mgbe o na-enwe mmekoahu. Nwoke nwere nsogbu a puru inwe agu mmekoahu, nukwa uto mmekoahu, ma gbapukwa obara ocha.

spouse.name: Otu e si achoputa Nsogbu a?
spouse.content: Onye dokita ga-aju nwoke ahu ajuju ufodu banyere ahuike ya, meekwa nnyocha ufodu. Onye dokita ga-acho ima ugboro ole o na-enwe nsogbu a. Dokita ga-enyocha obara na uburu nke onye ahu.

spouse.name: Ole otu esi agwo amu akwughi oto?
spouse.content:
E nwere otutu ihe aga-ezere iji gwoo amu akwughi oto nke oma. Ha gunyere ndia:-a. Zere utaba, ogwu ike, ma belata inu mmanya n’ aba n’ anya.
b.  Choputa ma zere ogwu ndi puru ikpata nsogbu ahuike
c.  Soro nwunye gi kwurita nsogbu a.
d.  Na-enwe mmega ahu na ndumodu
e.  A puru iwa ahu n’ utu ma nara ogwu ndi puru inye aka.

spouse.name: Idi ime, o puru imetuta mmasi m nwere maka mmekoahu?
spouse.content: Ee, o puru imetuta ochicho mmekoahu nke onye otu olulu gi. Idi ime puru Ime ka idorokwue mmasi nke di gi ma mee ka o choo ka gi na ya dina mgbe mgbe. Di gi puru idi n‘ echegbu onwe ya banyere afo ime gi, ibu oru nke ibu nne na nna. Nke a puru ibelata agu mmekoahu. Ikwurita banyere nchegbu na atu-manya unu dika di  na nwounye puru ime ka ahu rue unu ala.
